name: RES_AUTO_VER_AUDIT
description: This table contains auto verification audit trail information for result (OVR) records for lab.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: AUTO_VER_FAIL_RSN
columns.description: The reason why auto verification could not be performed if auto verification failed.
